name: Tiny Toon Adventures 2: Trouble in Wackyland
summary: Tiny Toon Adventures 2: Trouble in Wackyland is a Tiny Toon Adventures-based video game, released on the Nintendo Entertainment System in 1993, and developed and published by Konami. The game was originally released in Japan as Tiny Toon Adventures 2: Montana Land e Yōkoso (Tiny Toon Adventures 2 モンタナランドへようこそ, "Welcome to Montana Land"). According to the story there is a new amusement park in Acme Acres, and everyone has been invited to visit by a "Secret Admirer".
info:
